DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.document: This API is used to query the configuration information of applications under the specified business system.
DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "apm-6xYKFXYxo",
    "ServiceName": "java-order-service"
}
DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.title: This API Is Used To Query the Application Configuration Information

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: This example shows you how to query the business system apm-059oXBfTL, filter by dimensions of service.name (application name) and span.kind (client/server perspective), aggregate by service.name (application name) and span.kind (client/server perspective), and find metric data such as request_count (number of requests), error_request_count (number of error requests), duration_avg (average response time), slow_request_count (number of slow requests), and duration_p50 (time p50) within the start time to end time at an aggregation granularity of one minute.
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        },
        {
            "Key": "span.kind",
            "Value": "client"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "service_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Period": 60,
    "Metrics": [
        "request_count",
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg",
        "slow_request_count",
        "duration_p50"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name",
        "span.kind"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: Querying Service Metric Data With 1-Minute Aggregation Granularity Example

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: This example shows you how to query the business system apm-059oXBfTL, filter by dimensions of service.name (application name) and span.kind (client/server perspective), aggregate by service.name (application name) and span.kind (client/server perspective), and find metric data such as request_count (request quantity), error_request_count (error request quantity), duration_avg (average response time), slow_request_count (number of slow requests), and duration_p50 (time p50) within the start time to end time, with one minute as the aggregation granularity.
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        },
        {
            "Key": "span.kind",
            "Value": "client"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "service_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Metrics": [
        "request_count",
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg",
        "slow_request_count",
        "duration_p50"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name",
        "span.kind"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: Query Example Of Service_metric Indicator Data From Start To Termination Time

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: This example shows you how to query the business system apm-059oXBfTL, filter by the dimensional service.name (application name), aggregate by service.name (application name), and find the metric data of error_request_count (error request quantity) and duration_avg (average response time) within the start time-termination time at a one-minute aggregation granularity.
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "sql_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Period": 60,
    "Metrics": [
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: Example Of Querying Sql_metric Metric Data With 1-Minute Aggregation Granularity

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: This example shows you how to query the business system apm-059oXBfTL, filter by db.instance (database name) as a dimensional <adjective>, aggregate by service.name (application name) and db.statement (execution statement) as dimensions, and find the top5 duration_avg (duration (ms)) metric data within the start time - termination time.
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: Example Of Querying Metric Data For Duration_avg (Duration) Of Sql_metric From Start To Termination Time

    "Limit": 10
}

ModifyApmInstance.document: This API is used to modify APM business system parameters.
ModifyApmInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyApmInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "apm-CVfliqa8U",
    "Tags": [],
    "Description": "Test Business System"
    "TraceDuration": 0,
    "Name": "Test Business System"
    "OpenBilling": true,
    "SpanDailyCounters": 1,
    "ErrRateThreshold": 5,
    "SampleRate": 50,
    "ErrorSample": 1,
    "SlowRequestSavedThreshold": 500,
    "IsRelatedLog": 0,
    "LogRegion": "",
    "LogTopicID": "",
    "LogSet": "",
    "LogSource": ""
}
ModifyApmInstance.title: Successful Cases

ModifyGeneralApmApplicationConfig.document: Customers hope to be able to modify the application configuration information in batches through the API.
ModifyGeneralApmApplicationConfig.title: Modify Application Configuration Information
